Articles.Content: Hi, this app can help you translate this game to your language. [**This**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118578-KSP-Translator-%D0%9F%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BC%D0%BC%D0%B0-%D0%B4%D0%BB%D1%8F-%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D0%B8%D1%84%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%B8)is description(Russian) and program. You needs to download file, unzip it, open **ksptranslator.cfg** file and set your path to the game. Also **translates.json** file contains translates, you can delete it. After that you can launch **KSP Translator.jar** file. This app requires the **Java**. Before the patching translates do the backup from program.
